price: Basi wakikengeuka lilio juu yako wewe ni kufikisha ujumbe waziwazi.
arabic: فَإِن تَوَلَّوۡاْ فَإِنَّمَا عَلَيۡكَ ٱلۡبَلَٰغُ ٱلۡمُبِينُ
footnotes: Wakikupuuza, ewe Nabii, hao unao waita wafuate Uislamu, basi wewe huna jukumu kwa mapuuza yao. Haikulazimu wewe ila kufikisha ujumbe kwa uwazi, na hayo umekwisha fanya.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: fa-in tawallaw fa-innamā ʿalayka al-balāghu al-mubīnu
